price: Nígbà tí A sọ fún àwọn mọlāika pé: “Ẹ forí kanlẹ̀ kí Ādam. Wọ́n sì forí kanlẹ̀ kí i àfi ’Iblīs, (tí) ó kọ̀.”
arabic: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qul'nā lil'malāikati us'judū liādama fasajadū illā ib'līsa abā
